title: Derry
page_copy: Listen to radio stations from Derry, from a wide variety of genres like Adult Contemporary, News, Pop, Rock and Sports.  Enjoy stations such as CityBeat, River FM Kidz, Phoenix Country Radio , BBC - Radio Foyle, QNorthWest 102.9 and more.  Come find the top new songs, playlists, and music!  Listen on your iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch, Android, Blackberry, and other app-enabled mobile phones.

radios.title: BBC - Radio Foyle

radio_info.short: BBC - Radio Foyle (Irish: BBC Raidió Feabhail ) is a radio station from Derry, Northern Ireland, United Kingdom, providing News, Sports and Weather as
radio_info.rest:
well as Top 40 Adult Contemporary Pop and Rock music.

------
Shows: Morning Reports, Up All Night, Wake Up to Money, 5 live Breakfast, Weekend Breakfast Show, Rejoice, A Kist O' Wurds, Across The Line, Across The Line - Dance, After Midnight with Donna Legge, After Midnight with Joe Lindsay, After Midnight with Linley Hamilton, After Midnight with Mickey Bradley, After Midnight with Stephen McCauley, An Domhnach Mor/The Big Sunday, Arts Extra, B Boys Swing & Highland Flings, BBC Saturday Sports Show, Blas, Calvin at 500, Caschlar, Cúlán, Days Like This, Electric Mainline, Evening Extra, Farm Gate, Folk Club, Gardeners' Corner, Gerry Anderson, Good Morning Ulster, Hugo Duncan, Inside Politics, Inside Politics, Jazz Club, Mark Patterson, Morning Service, News at One, On Your Behalf, Paul Moore, Pipes and Drums, Radio Foyle Morning Programme, Radio Foyle News, Radio Ulster News, Ralph McLean - Classic Albums, Ralph McLean - Country, Ralph McLean - Legendary Voices, Ralph McLean - Soul Music, Sarah Brett, Saturday Club, Saturday Magazine, Sean Coyle, Seven Days (R Ulster), Sounds Classical, Sounds Sacred, Stephen McCauley, Summer Club, Sunday Club, Sunday Sequence, Sunday with Brian D'Arcy, Talk Back, The '59 Revival: The Outpouring, The Book of Irish Writers, The Late Show with Cherrie McIlwaine, The Late Show with Colin Murray, The Late Show with Eamon Friel, The Late Show With Kim Lenaghan, The Late Show with Stuart Bailie, This New Day, Today at the Assembly, Wah Yan Jee Sing, Weekend Extra, Your Place and Mine
